title: Martin Lodge on Bank Fines
itunes:author: Professor Martin Lodge
description: Contributor(s): Professor Martin Lodge | Professor Martin Lodge discusses the recent foreign exchange scandal, the fines levied on Banks by UK, US and Switzerland regulators and the wider picture of financial regulation.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Professor Martin Lodge | Professor Martin Lodge discusses the recent foreign exchange scandal, the fines levied on Banks by UK, US and Switzerland regulators and the wider picture of financial regulation.
